description.narrative: The project will enable RYCO to enhance mutual trust and reconciliation across the Western Balkans (WB6) region

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: Outcome Indicator 1: Percentage of youth (male and female) that indicate positive attitudes towards other ethnic groups in the region Outcome Indicator 2: Percentage of youth (male and female) that have been the object of discriminatory behavior in the past 4 months.

comment.narrative:
For Outcome indicator 1: Baseline (2018-9): xxx % (to be measured at baseline survey) Target (2020): 20 percentage points increase by end of project
For Outcome indicator 2: Baseline (2018-9): xxx % (to be measured at baseline survey) Target (2020): 20 percentage points decrease by end of project
